nodes.documentation:
@dev Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the
total shares, their previous withdrawals and changes to the group resulting in escrow.
nodes.name: release

nodes.documentation:
@dev Triggers a transfer of data from one 'account` to another. This can be used if the account is changing but
the reciepient remains the same. It can also be used to quarantine or remove an account.
nodes.name: migratePayee

nodes.documentation:
@dev In order to change share percentage of accounts we must escrow the remaining balance under current scheme
and begin a new shares scheme by reconstructing the 'Payment Splitter'.
nodes.name: escrowPayees

nodes.documentation:
@dev This begins a new shares scheme by reconstructing the 'Payment Splitter'.
Warning potential for high gas costs -- test the limits

escrow(address).details: Getter for the total amount of Ether put in escrow.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

migratePayee(address,address).details: Triggers a transfer of data from one 'account` to another. This can be used if the account is changing but the reciepient remains the same. It can also be used to quarantine or remove an account.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payee(uint256).details: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

payeeArray().details: Getter for the address array payee.

previousTotalReceived().details: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

reconstructor(address[],uint256[]).details: This begins a new shares scheme by reconstructing the 'Payment Splitter'. Warning potential for high gas costs -- test the limits

release(address).details: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares, their previous withdrawals and changes to the group resulting in escrow.

released(address).details: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

shares(address).details: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

totalEscrow().details: Getter for the total Ether held in Escrow.

totalReleased().details: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

totalShares().details: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawals(address).details: Getter for the total amount of Ether released to payee in most recent share distribution.
